member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE
member.summary: The TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE enumeration defines the possible TCP offload states for a TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE.TcpConnectionOffloadStateInHost
member.summary: The TCP connection is currently owned by the network stack on the local computer, and is not offloaded

member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE.TcpConnectionOffloadStateOffloading
member.summary: The TCP connection is in the process of being offloaded, but the offload has not been completed.

member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE.TcpConnectionOffloadStateOffloaded
member.summary: The TCP connection is offloaded to the network interface controller.

member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE.TcpConnectionOffloadStateUploading
member.summary: The TCP connection is in the process of being uploaded back to the network stack on the local computer, but the reinstate-to-host process has not completed.

member.name: TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE.TcpConnectionOffloadStateMax
member.summary: The maximum possible value for the TCP_CONNECTION_OFFLOAD_STATE enumeration type. This is not a legal value for the possible TCP connection offload state.
